meanings.definition: Waste matter discharged from the bowels; excrement.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined the patient's faeces for any signs of illness.
meanings.sent3: The dog thought the faeces left by the cat were a tasty treat.
meanings.sent4: The pollution in the river was like faeces poisoning the environment.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the faeces on the sidewalk was enough to make anyone feel sick.

meanings.sent1: The faeces of the cow fertilized the soil.
meanings.sent2: The zookeeper cleaned the elephant's faeces from the enclosure.
meanings.sent3: The raccoon seemed proud of the faeces it left in the garden.
meanings.sent4: The city streets were littered with faeces from stray animals.
meanings.sent5: The smell of faeces in the barn was overpowering.
